personal.name: Thinh
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.tagline: A passionate developer crafting beautiful digital experiences with modern technologies.
personal.availableText: I'm open for freelance projects and full-time opportunities. Let's create something amazing together!

bio: When I'm not immersed in code, you'll find me exploring the world through my camera lens, getting lost in a good book, or hunting for the perfect cup of specialty coffee.
I believe that diverse experiences fuel creativity. Every new place I visit, every song I learn, every game I play - they all contribute to how I approach problem-solving and design.
My philosophy is simple: stay curious, keep learning, and never stop creating. Life is too short for boring things.

quote.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quote.author: Peter Drucker

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern (Fullstack Developer)
experiences.description: Developed high-performance web interfaces using ReactJS integrated with Python (Django) backend. Built internal digital transformation tools, focusing on automation testing and developing Backend services for management systems.

achievements: AEON 1% Scholarship for Academic & Extracurricular Excellence (2025-2027)

hobbies.name: Music
hobbies.description: Playing guitar and discovering new artists

hobbies.name: Coffee
hobbies.description: Exploring specialty coffee and brewing methods

projects.title: ThinhPay - Digital Payment Platform
projects.description: A Modular Monolith fintech system simulating core banking operations. Built with Domain-Driven Design (DDD) and Hexagonal Architecture. Features secure RESTful APIs, JWT authentication, and Redis caching. Full-stack with Angular frontend and Spring Boot backend.

projects.title: HCMUE Course Registration System
projects.description: Full-stack course registration system for HCMUE university. Built with React + TypeScript frontend using Redux Toolkit for state management. Django REST API backend with PostgreSQL on Neon. Containerized with Docker for easy deployment.

projects.title: KaraokeHKT - Management System
projects.description: Full-stack karaoke venue management system with booking, room management, and billing features. ReactJS frontend deployed on Vercel, ASP.NET Core Web API backend for robust business logic.

projects.title: Java E-Commerce Keyboard Platform
projects.description: Fullstack e-commerce platform migrated to Java Spring ecosystem. RESTful backend with Spring Boot, Repository Pattern and Spring Data JPA. Secure authentication using Spring Security and JWT.

projects.title: Knowledge Graph for STEM Education
projects.description: Research project applying Neo4j for knowledge graph modeling to structure complex educational data. Web application powered by Spring Data Neo4j for efficient graph queries.
